header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN SPECIAL PUBLIC BILL COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Schedule 1, page 6, line 26, leave out paragraph 4 and insert—
text.IndentOne: (a) may make an order under paragraph 3(1) consequent upon an annual review, the first of which must be conducted no later than 12 months from the coming into force of this schedule, with subsequent reviews to be conducted no later than 12 months after the most recent review;

(b) must make an order under paragraph 3(1) whenever the value of the consumer price index has exceeded, by more than 15 percent, its value either at the time when this Schedule comes into force or at the time of the most recent order, whichever is the later date.”

text.quote: 000: Clause 9, page 4, line 31, at end insert—
“(6) After paragraph (c) of that proviso, insert—

“( ) The trustees in exercising the power conferred by this subsection must ensure that the money or property so paid be treated as a percentage of the presumptive share of the beneficiary to whom it is paid, transferred or applied and be brought into account accordingly.””
